data.title: MIT Licenses
data.text:
Licenses : X/MIT Licenses

Previous: XFree86 License (version 1.1)

Next: Berkeley-style Licenses

5. X/MIT Licenses

Some forms of the X/MIT licenses require that the copyright and license notices be reproduced in supporting documentation. Copyright notices are included here, grouped with the applicable license notices.

5.1. MIT

This is the form of the MIT licence that was used with X11R5. A lot of contributors to XFree86 have adopted this license.
